pages.content: The §cEternal Guardian§r is a spectral entity summoned to protect fallen warriors' belongings. They are bound to the §5Eternal Guardian's Band§r and will attack anyone who approaches the tombstone they guard.

§6Defeating a Guardian§r

When slain, the Guardian drops its §5Head§r, which can be crafted into the powerful §5Eternal Guardian Mask§r.

§7Warning: Guardians are formidable opponents. Prepare accordingly.§r
